text:
Came across this friendly pub without a hint of the dingy and musty characteristics you might expect from a standard bar. Food menu was sizeable enough, and a range of drinks including promotions even for soju!
We opted just for food this time, with a creamy Wild Mushroom soup drizzled with truffle oil, and Smoked Duck pasta which was well-seasoned.
Definitely somewhere you can return for a cosy get-together with loved ones!
Our new go to drinks spot in katong! Cheap Guinness, and food is alright though it can be better. If you’re just looking for a pint or 2 + bar food - it’s definitely really affordable!
Nice, cosy ambience.  The decor inside is nice and pleasant.  The good is good and Sapporo Beer is by the hour from 3pm to 7pm starting with $3 a pint!

This bar is 6/7 minutes walk from my nephew’s apartment where I stayed for a 2 week holiday.It’s outstanding,,,,time o’clock deal on Sapporo beer is tremendous value.Service is prompt,efficient and thoroughly polite.Food is good with crispy pork belly especially recommended.
Food are decent and prices are reasonable, must order the mango salads thumb up
